民.definition: (bound form) the people; inhabitants of a country

民不聊生.definition: The people have no way to make a living (idiom, from Record of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4]); no way of getting by

民主化.definition: to convert to democracy; democratic transformation

民主建港協進聯盟.pinyin: Min2 zhu3 Jian4 gang3 Xie2 jin4 Lian2 meng2
民主建港協進聯盟.definition: Democratic Alliance for the Betterment and Progress of Hong Kong (DAB), a pro-Beijing political party in Hong Kong

民主派.definition: (Hong Kong politics) the pro-democracy camp (founded 1987), aka the pan-democrats

民主牆.definition: Democracy Wall, Beijing (1978-1979), and bulletin boards inspired by it, in some Hong Kong universities

民主進步黨.definition: DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan); abbr. to 民進黨|民进党

民主革命.definition: democratic revolution; bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)

民事訴訟.definition: common plea; civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)

民以食為天.definition: Food is the God of the people. (idiom); People view food as the primary need.; Food first, ethical niceties second

民企.definition: privately-operated enterprise (abbr. for 民營企業|民营企业[min2 ying2 qi3 ye4])

民勤.definition: Minqin county in Wuwei 武威[Wu3 wei1], Gansu

民勤縣.definition: Minqin county in Wuwei 武威[Wu3 wei1], Gansu

民國.definition: Republic of China (1912-1949); used in Taiwan as the name of the calendar era (e.g. 民國六十年|民国六十年 is 1971, the 60th year after 1911)

民國通俗演義.pinyin: Min2 guo2 tong1 su2 yan3 yi4
民國通俗演義.definition: Dramatized history of Republican China until 1927 by Cai Dongfan 蔡東藩|蔡东藩, and later chapters by Xu Qinfu 許廑父|许廑父

民家.definition: minka; commoner's house; Bai ethnic group

民宿.definition: (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 民宿 "minshuku") property rented via Airbnb or similar platform; guesthouse; bed-and-breakfast; homestay; pension

民工.definition: migrant worker (who moved from a rural area of China to a city to find work); temporary worker enlisted on a public project

民建聯.definition: Democratic Alliance for the Betterment and Progress of Hong Kong (DAB), a pro-Beijing political party in Hong Kong (abbr. for 民主建港協進聯盟|民主建港协进联盟[Min2 zhu3 Jian4 gang3 Xie2 jin4 Lian2 meng2])

民怨.definition: popular grievance; complaints of the people

民怨沸騰.definition: seething discontent (idiom); popular grievances boil over

民怨鼎沸.definition: seething discontent (idiom); popular grievances boil over

民情.definition: circumstances of the people; popular sentiment; the mood of the people; popular customs

民意.definition: public opinion; popular will; public will

民政部.definition: Ministry of Civil Affairs (MCA) of the PRC

民數記.definition: Book of Numbers; Fourth Book of Moses

民族主義.definition: nationalism; national self-determination; principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers); racism

民族主義情緒.pinyin: min2 zu2 zhu3 yi4 qing2 xu4

民族大學.definition: University for Nationalities (university of ethnic studies)

民族工業.definition: national industry; industry run by Chinese nationals or ethnic Chinese

民族社會主義.pinyin: min2 zu2 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4

民族雜居地區.pinyin: min2 zu2 za2 ju1 di4 qu1

民樂.definition: folk music, esp. for traditional instruments

民樂縣.definition: Minyue county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu

民權主義.definition: democracy; civil liberties; principle of democracy, the second of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning widespread popular involvement in affairs of state)

民權縣.definition: Minquan county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan

民營.definition: privately run (i.e. by a company, not the state)

民生主義.definition: principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)

民生凋敝.definition: the people's livelihood is reduced to destitution (idiom); a time of famine and impoverishment

民盟.definition: China Democratic League (political party); abbr. for 中國民主同盟|中国民主同盟

民眾.definition: the populace; the masses; the common people

民科.definition: pseudoscientist; crank; crackpot (abbr. for 民間科學家|民间科学家)

民窮財盡.definition: the people are impoverished, their means exhausted (idiom); to drive the nation to bankruptcy

民粹派.definition: the Narodniks, Russian populist group in the 19th century

民脂民膏.definition: lit. the fat and wealth of the people (idiom); the nation's hard-won wealth (esp. as an object of unscrupulous exploitation); the people's blood, sweat and tears

民警.definition: civil police; PRC police; abbr. for 人民警察

民變.definition: mass uprising; popular revolt; civil commotion

民豐.definition: Minfeng County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang

民豐縣.definition: Minfeng County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang

民賊獨夫.definition: tyrant and oppressor of the people (idiom); traitorous dictator

民辦.definition: run by the local people; privately operated

民進.definition: China Association for Promoting Democracy (abbr. for 中國民主促進會|中国民主促进会[Zhong1guo2 Min2zhu3 Cu4jin4hui4])

民進黨.definition: DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan); abbr. for 民主進步黨|民主进步党

民運.definition: civil transport; movement aimed at the masses; democracy movement (abbr.)

民間.definition: among the people; popular; folk; non-governmental; involving people rather than governments

民雄.definition: Minxiong or Minhsiung Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

民雄鄉.definition: Minxiong or Minhsiung Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

民風.definition: popular customs; folkways; the character of the people of a nation (or region etc)
